original_text: But he could see his disciples. They were trying to make the boat move along. But it was very difficult for them because the wind was blowing in the opposite direction. Then, when it was nearly dawn, Jesus walked on the water towards his disciples. He seemed to be going on past them.
korean_text: 바람이 거스르므로 제자들이 힘겹게 노 젓는 것을 보시고 밤 사경쯤에 바다 위로 걸어서 그들에게 오사 지나가려고 하시매

sentences.original_text: But he could see his disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그의 제자들을 볼 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They were trying to make the boat move along
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 배를 나아가게 하려고 노력하고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: But it was very difficult for them
because the wind was blowing in the opposite direction
sentences.korean_translation: 바람이 반대 방향으로 불고 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: Then, when it was nearly dawn
He seemed to be going on past them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 지나쳐 가는 것처럼 보였습니다
